title: Openrider - GPS Cycling Riding
summary: Enjoy your bike ride with Openrider.
developerAddress: 313 Seongsu IT Center, 37, Seongsui-ro 22-gil, Seongdong-gu, Seoul, Korea
description: Enjoy your bike ride with Openrider!★ Google Fit Developer Challenge grand prize winner!http://googledevelopers.blogspot.com/2015/04/the-google-fit-developer-challenge.html▶ Features (Free!)- Bike computer: Simple and intuitive UI with full material design- Perfect combination map and speedometer: Easy to change the map and the speedometer- Statistics and graphs: Analyze your bike record with various graphs on the map.- Ranking and level: Competition with your friends.- Theme: White and Black Theme- Sync: Sync your record with Google Fit, S Health and Strava- Sensor: Connect to yourBluetooth Smart & ANT+ Heart rate monitor, speed & cadence sensor.- Share: Share your record with your social media. You can also import and export it with GPX file.- Smart Watch support (Android wear, Gear S/S2)▶ Upgrade to Mania package!- 2 more customizable speedometer skin- Training for Heart rate and RPM skin- Downloadable offline maps- Smart Watch Heart rate sensor support- Removal ads* If you have any suggestion to us, please mail to help@cufit.net
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy your bike ride with Openrider!

★ Google Fit Developer Challenge grand prize winner!
http://googledevelopers.blogspot.com/2015/04/the-google-fit-developer-challenge.html

▶ Features (Free!)
- Bike computer: Simple and intuitive UI with full material design
- Perfect combination map and speedometer: Easy to change the map and the speedometer
- Statistics and graphs: Analyze your bike record with various graphs on the map.
- Ranking and level: Competition with your friends.
- Theme: White and Black Theme
- Sync: Sync your record with Google Fit, S Health and Strava
- Sensor: Connect to yourBluetooth Smart & ANT+ Heart rate monitor, speed & cadence sensor.
- Share: Share your record with your social media. You can also import and export it with GPX file.
- Smart Watch support (Android wear, Gear S/S2)

▶ Upgrade to Mania package!
- 2 more customizable speedometer skin
- Training for Heart rate and RPM skin
- Downloadable offline maps
- Smart Watch Heart rate sensor support
- Removal ads

* If you have any suggestion to us, please mail to help@cufit.net
comments: Too lame asking to give up your contacts. How is it even legal handing over contact information to strangers with out consent. GPS seems non functional. Imidiate uninstall.
Excited to find a nice bike computer, the GPS seems to be tracking my location fine, but speedometer is not indicating a speed. It just stays at zero.

I've been cycling for the past 1 month , I used many apps namely Strava, Runtastic, Map my ride, Google Fit, but honestly i must admit that this is by far the best app i Used. The app continuously monitors and displays the speed and distance, which is not available on other apps.
좋은 어플이지만 자꾸 통계 알려줄 따 방향을 안알려줍니다ㅠ몇번 헤맸어요 소리만듣고가는디
I really liked the app at first but now it drains all my battery when I'm running the app and linked to my Samsung phone and filming a video.......and charging take forever.....now as well.....
Easy to check how long distance i exercised. Useful app
